thread.title: BRIEF-Depuy Synthes Signs Definitive Agreement To Acquire Assets Of Medical Enterprises Distribution

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Depuy Synthes Signs Definitive Agreement To Acquire Assets Of Medical Enterprises Distribution

organizations.name: synthes signs definitive agreement to acquire assets of medical enterprises distribution

text:
May 14 (Reuters) - DePuy Synthes:
* DEPUY SYNTHES SIGNS DEFINITIVE AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE ASSETS OF MEDICAL ENTERPRISES DISTRIBUTION, LLC TO STRENGTHEN ITS PORTFOLIO AND AMPLIFY THE SURGEONâ€™S CAPABILITIES VIA AUTOMATION
* DEPUY SYNTHES PRODUCTS - SIGNED AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE ASSETS OF MEDICAL ENTERPRISES DISTRIBUTION; FINANCIAL TERMS OF DEAL ARE NOT BEING DISCLOSED Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
